and is she ‘not feeling well’?
/circle6 Does she feel unhappy or cry easily? Th is indicates post-partum depression, and usually 
occurs 4–7 days aft er delivery. Assure her that everything will be fi ne and refer her to the 
MO only if the problem persists.
/circle6 Are there any other complaints?
B. Examination
Th is is similar to the examination conducted during the fi rst visit. It includes the following:
/circle6 Check the pulse, blood pressure and temperature.
/circle6 Check for pallor.
